name: Life is Beautiful
description: Finding inspiration and beauty in everyday life. Working with difficult situations. Building strength and courage. Quotes, images, videos and songs.

tasks.name: Life is Beautiful
tasks.description_short: It's old folks in love; It's my sweet baby's laugh; It's I got your back brother whatever it takes...
tasks.description_html:
We are huge fans of Willy Tea Taylor! His sound is authentic and his lyrics are down to earth poetry. His song "Life is Beautiful" was the inspiration for creating this app. Hope you'll enjoy it too!

(Btw, if you like the app, please upgrade it. Upgrades lets us find more inspiring content like this.)
tasks.author: Willy Tea Taylor

tasks.name: The power
tasks.description_short: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
tasks.description_html: Find something beautiful in your life and create a poster about it. Share it with your loved ones.
tasks.author: Louisa May Alcott
tasks.poster_button: Create a "The Power of Finding Beauty" Poster

tasks.name: Promise
tasks.description_short: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
tasks.description_html: Even if we're apart, I'll always be with you. I'll always be with you. I'll always be with you...
tasks.author: A.A. Milne

tasks.name: Every
tasks.description_short: Every moment is a golden one for him who has the vision to recognize it as such.
tasks.description_html: Life moves on, whether we act as cowards or heroes. Life has no other discipline to impose, if we would but realize it, than to accept life unquestioningly. Everything we shut our eyes to, everything we run away from, everything we deny, denigrate or despise, serves to defeat us in the end. What seems nasty, painful, evil, can become a source of beauty, joy, and strength, if faced with an open mind. Every moment is a golden one for him who has the vision to recognize it as such.
tasks.author: Henry Miller

tasks.name: A problem
tasks.description_short: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
tasks.author: Duke Ellington

tasks.name: The world
tasks.description_short: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater.
tasks.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

tasks.name: Somewhere Over the Rainbow
tasks.description_short: Someday I'll wish upon a star; Wake up where the clouds are far behind me; Where trouble melts like lemon drops; High above the chimney tops; That's where you'll find me.
tasks.author: E.Y. Harburg, The Wizard of Oz

tasks.name: Live today
tasks.description_short: Live today. Not yesterday. Not tomorrow. Just today. Inhabit your moments. Don’t rent them out to tomorrow.
tasks.author: Jerry Spinelli

tasks.name: When everything
tasks.description_short: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
tasks.author: Henry Ford

tasks.name: If you
tasks.description_short: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
tasks.author: Nora Roberts

tasks.name: What a Wonderful World
tasks.description_short: I hear babies cry, I watch them grow; They'll learn much more than I'll ever know. And I think to myself... what a wonderful world!
tasks.author: Louis Armstrong

tasks.name: Be yourself
tasks.description_short: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
tasks.author: Oscar Wilde

tasks.name: Isn't
tasks.description_short: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
tasks.author: L.M. Montgomery

tasks.name: You have
tasks.description_short: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
tasks.description_html:
...You're on your own. And you know what you know. You are the guy who'll decide where to go.

Consider upgrading the app :) Upgrades let us dedicate more time to finding trully inspiring content for the app.
tasks.author: Dr. Seuss

tasks.name: Keep on
tasks.description_short: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
tasks.author: Charles F. Kettering

tasks.name: Happiness
tasks.description_short: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, or worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
tasks.author: Denis Waitley

tasks.name: God
tasks.description_short: God doesn't require us to succeed, he only requires that you try.
tasks.author: Mother Teresa

tasks.name: Imagine
tasks.description_short: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope some day you'll join us and the world will live as one.
tasks.author: John Lennon

tasks.name: I have
tasks.description_short: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
tasks.author: Thomas A. Edison

tasks.name: When you
tasks.description_short: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
tasks.author: Marcus Aurelius

tasks.name: Lynn's Theme
tasks.description_short: In thanksgiving for life, I pledge to overcome the illusion of entitlement by reminding myself that everything is a gift and, thus, to live gratefully.
tasks.author: Brother David Steindl-Rast

tasks.name: A mind
tasks.description_short: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
tasks.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

tasks.name: Eat
tasks.description_short: Eat healthily, sleep well, breathe deeply, move harmoniously.
tasks.author: Jean-Pierre Barral

tasks.name: Every day
tasks.description_short: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it.
tasks.author: Dalai Lama

tasks.name: Be like
tasks.description_short: Be like the sun for grace and mercy. Be like the night to cover others' faults. Be like running water for generosity. Be like death for rage and anger. Be like the Earth for modesty. Appear as you are. Be as you appear.
tasks.author: Rumi

tasks.name: What you
tasks.description_short: What you have to decide... is how you want your life to be. If your forever was ending tomorrow, would this be how you'd want to have spent it? Listen, the truth is, nothing is guaranteed. You know that more than anybody. So don't be afraid. Be alive.
tasks.author: Sarah Dessen

tasks.name: Row, Row, Row your Boat
tasks.description_short: Row, row, row your boat; Gently down the stream. Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily; Life is but a dream.

tasks.name: A ship
tasks.description_short: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
tasks.author: William G.T. Shedd

tasks.name: I know
tasks.description_short: Your mind is not a cage. It's a garden. And it requires cultivating.
tasks.author: Libba Bray

tasks.name: Brand New Game
tasks.description_short: And he never thought life would get so real; Because he always thought, life was a baseball field; And even if you lost, never complain; There is always tomorrow and a brand new game.
tasks.author: Willy Tea Taylor

tasks.name: Without
tasks.description_short: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities.
tasks.author: Gloria Steinem

tasks.name: If you're
tasks.description_short: If you're reading this... Congratulations, you're alive. If that's not something to smile about, then I don't know what is.
tasks.author: Chad Sugg

tasks.name: It is
tasks.description_short: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
tasks.author: Harry Truman

tasks.name: In the
tasks.description_short: In the end you can't always choose what to keep. You can only choose how you let it go.
tasks.author: Ally Condie

tasks.name: Everybody's Free To Wear Sunscreen
tasks.description_short: Do one thing every day that scares you...
tasks.author: Baz Luhrmann

tasks.name: If we
tasks.description_short: If we are creating ourselves all the time, then it is never too late to begin creating the bodies we want instead of the ones we mistakenly assume we are stuck with.
tasks.author: Deepak Chopra

tasks.name: Don’t
tasks.description_short: Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
tasks.author: Howard Thurman

tasks.name: Even
tasks.description_short: Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
tasks.author: Will Rogers

tasks.name: If you don’t
tasks.description_short: If you don’t like something change it; if you can’t change it, change the way you think about it.
tasks.author: Mary Engelbreit

tasks.name: I've failed
tasks.description_short: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
tasks.author: Michael Jordan

tasks.name: I ask
tasks.description_short: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders.
tasks.author: Jewish Proverb

tasks.name: Live as
tasks.description_short: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
tasks.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tasks.name: You've gotta
tasks.description_short: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, love like you'll never be hurt, sing like there's nobody listening, and live like it's heaven on earth.
tasks.author: William W. Purkey

tasks.name: Love
tasks.description_short: Love is only a word, until someone arrives to give it meaning. Don’t give up. Remember, it’s always the last key on the keyring that opens the door.
tasks.author: Paulo Coelho

tasks.name: What lies
tasks.description_short: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
tasks.author: Henry S. Haskins

tasks.name: A Good Day
tasks.description_short: Begin by opening your eyes and be surprised that you have eyes you can open, that incredible array of colors that is constantly offered to us for pure enjoyment...
tasks.author: Brother David Steindl-Rast

tasks.name: In the
tasks.description_short: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
tasks.author: Abraham Lincoln

tasks.name: Only
tasks.description_short: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
tasks.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

tasks.name: Two roads
tasks.description_short: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
tasks.author: Robert Frost

tasks.name: I never
tasks.description_short: I never said it would be easy, I only said it would be worth it.
tasks.author: Mae West

tasks.name: Write
tasks.description_short: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.
tasks.author: Joss Whedon

tasks.name: Keep
tasks.description_short: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
tasks.author: Theodore Roosevelt

tasks.name: Start
tasks.description_short: Start by doing what is necessary, then what is possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
tasks.author: St. Francis of Assisi

tasks.name: Dripping
tasks.description_short: Dripping water hollows out stone, not through force but through persistence.
tasks.author: Ovid

tasks.name: Instead
tasks.description_short: Instead of cursing the darkness, light a candle.
tasks.author: Benjamin Franklin

tasks.name: In order
tasks.description_short: In order to be open to creativity, one must have the capacity for constructive use of solitude. One must overcome the fear of being alone.
tasks.author: Rollo May

tasks.name: This life
tasks.description_short: This life we've been given, this love within us, our capacity for feeling ecstasy and giving joy - these are nothing short of divine.
tasks.author: Philip Toshio Sudo

tasks.name: American beauty
tasks.description_short: It's hard to stay mad when there's so much beauty in the world.
tasks.author: Thomas Newman, American Beauty

tasks.name: The only way
tasks.description_short: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
tasks.author: Steve Jobs

tasks.name: No matter
tasks.description_short: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn’t trying.
tasks.author: Tony Robbins

tasks.name: Give
tasks.description_short: Give and get a hug!
tasks.author: Brandi-Ann Uyemura

tasks.name: Nothing
tasks.description_short: Nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear.
tasks.author: Steve Maraboli

tasks.name: It's
tasks.description_short: It's not the face, but the expressions on it. It's not the voice, but what you say. It's not how you look in that body, but the thing you do with it. You are beautiful.
tasks.author: Stephenie Meyer

tasks.name: We’ve
tasks.description_short: We’ve all been given a gift, the gift of life. What we do with our lives is our gift back.
tasks.author: Edo

tasks.name: Breathe
tasks.description_short: Breathe, and enjoy each moment of this life. They’re too fleeting and few to waste.
tasks.description_html:
- For more quotes like this get our app Zen Habits

If you feel overwhelmed, breathe. It will calm you and release the tensions.

If you are worried about something coming up, or caught up in something that already happened, breathe. It will bring you back to the present.

If you are moving too fast, breathe. It will remind you to slow down, and enjoy life more.

Breathe, and enjoy each moment of this life. They’re too fleeting and few to waste.
tasks.author: Leo Babauta

tasks.name: We must
tasks.description_short: We must have perseverance and confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing can be attained. For he who never made a mistake, never made a discovery.
tasks.author: Society in Science

tasks.name: As you walk
tasks.description_short: As you walk and eat and travel, be where you are. Otherwise you will miss most of your life.
tasks.author: Jack Kornfield

tasks.name: Being
tasks.description_short: Being sad and angry and feeling the whole range of human emotions is part of being alive. Not being stuck in any of them is a key to happiness.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Awakening Joy - 10 Steps to Happiness, made in collaboration with James Baraz.
tasks.author: James Baraz

tasks.name: Live
tasks.description_short: Live your happiest life by accepting that some people can only be in your life as lessons and/or memories.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Instant PepTalk - Happiness, made in collaboration with Karen Salmansohn.
tasks.author: Karen Salmasohn

tasks.name: I am
tasks.description_short: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
tasks.author: Vincent van Gogh

tasks.name: I am
tasks.description_short: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
tasks.author: Carl Gustav Jung

tasks.name: It always
tasks.description_short: It always seems impossible until it’s done...
tasks.author: Nelson Mandela

tasks.name: Happy
tasks.description_short: Happy are those who dream dreams and are ready to pay the price to make them come true.
tasks.author: Leon J. Suenens

tasks.name: What
tasks.description_short: What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step.
tasks.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

tasks.name: Nature
tasks.description_short: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
tasks.author: Lao Tzu

tasks.name: I hope you
tasks.description_short: I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the courage to start all over again.
tasks.author: Eric Roth

tasks.name: We must
tasks.description_short: We must never forget that it is through our actions, words, and thoughts that we have a choice.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our new app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

tasks.name: Every day
tasks.description_short: Every day brings a choice: to practice stress or to practice peace.
tasks.author: Joan Borysenko

tasks.name: Kind words
tasks.description_short: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
tasks.author: Mother Teresa

tasks.name: The reason
tasks.description_short: The reason we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind-the-scenes with everyone else’s highlight reel.
tasks.author: Steve Furtick

tasks.name: Celebrate
tasks.description_short: Celebrate endings, for they precede new beginnings.
tasks.author: Jonathan L. Huie

tasks.name: The earth
tasks.description_short: The earth does not belong to man, man belongs to the earth.
tasks.description_html:
:

All things are connected like the blood that unites us all. Man did not weave the web of life, he is merely a strand in it. Whatever he does to the web, he does to himself. Chief Seattle's Letter: http://www.csun.edu/~vcpsy00h/seattle.htm
tasks.author: Chief Seattle

tasks.name: Success
tasks.description_short: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.
tasks.author: Winston Churchill

tasks.name: Begin
tasks.description_short: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
tasks.author: Seneca

tasks.name: You don’t
tasks.description_short: You don’t need a lot to live well - you just need the right mindset.
tasks.description_html: This is a quote from our new iOS app Zen Habits. Please check it out.
tasks.author: Leo Babauta

tasks.name: Think
tasks.description_short: Think of something for which you are grateful today. Say thanks.
tasks.author: Rabbi Terry Bookman

tasks.name: You are never
tasks.description_short: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
tasks.author: C. S. Lewis

tasks.name: The time
tasks.description_short: The time to relax is when you don’t have time for it.
tasks.author: Sydney J. Harris

tasks.name: Even if
tasks.description_short: Even if something is left undone, everyone must take time to sit still and watch the leaves turn.
tasks.author: Elizabeth Lawrence

tasks.name: Joy
tasks.description_short: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
tasks.author: Karl Barth

tasks.name: Find
tasks.description_short: Beauty and inspiration are everywhere... The petals of a flower. A steaming cup of tea. Plenty of fresh water. An abundance of tasty foods...
tasks.author: Paige Burkes

tasks.name: As you
tasks.description_short: As you take the normal opportunities of your daily life and create something of beauty and helpfulness, you improve not only the world around you but also the world within you.
tasks.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

tasks.name: The way
tasks.description_short: The way to accomplish the assignment of truly living is to engage fully, richly, and deeply in the living of your dreams. We are made to dream and to live those dreams.
tasks.description_html:
Why Dream?

Life is a difficult assignment. We are fragile creatures, expected to function at high rates of speed, and asked to accomplish great and small things each day. These daily activities take enormous amounts of energy. Most things are out of our control. We are surrounded by danger, frustration, grief, and insanity as well as love, hope, ecstasy, and wonder. Being fully human is an exercise in humility, suffering, grace, and great humor. Things and people all around us die, get broken, or are lost. There is no safety or guarantees.

The way to accomplish the assignment of truly living is to engage fully, richly, and deeply in the living of your dreams. We are made to dream and to live those dreams.
tasks.author: SARK

tasks.name: When I
tasks.description_short: When I dare to be powerful – to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
tasks.author: Audre Lorde

tasks.name: The cave
tasks.description_short: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek.
tasks.description_html:
Where you stumble, there lies your treasure. The very cave you are afraid to enter turns out to be the source of what you are looking for. The damned thing in the cave, that was so dreaded, has become the center.

The ultimate aim of the quest must be neither release nor ecstasy for oneself, but the wisdom and the power to serve others.
tasks.author: Joseph Campbell

tasks.name: We tend
tasks.description_short: We tend to forget that happiness doesn’t come as a result of getting something we don’t have, but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have.
tasks.author: Frederick Keonig

tasks.name: Let there
tasks.description_short: Let there be an opening into the quiet that lies beneath the chaos, where you find the peace you did not think possible and see what shimmers within the storm.
tasks.description_html:
Blessing in the Chaos

To all that is chaotic in you, let there come silence.

Let there be a calming of the clamoring, a stilling of the voices that have laid their claim on you, that have made their home in you, that go with you even to the holy places but will not let you rest, will not let you hear your life with wholeness or feel the grace that fashioned you.

Let what distracts you cease. Let what divides you cease. Let there come an end to what diminishes and demeans, and let depart all that keeps you in its cage.
tasks.author: Jan Richardson

tasks.name: You have
tasks.description_short: You have a unique set of precious values that can only be fulfilled by pursuing what drives you the most: your passions and dreams.
tasks.description_html:
You simply cannot give to the world all that you have to give to the world if you do not remain true to your own “selfish” desires. You have a unique set of precious values that can only be fulfilled by pursuing what drives you the most: your passions and dreams. Could Thomas Edison have tended to the downtrodden as Mother Teresa did? Could Albert Einstein have preached salvation as Martin Luther King Jr. did? Could Abraham Lincoln have built cars like Henry Ford?

Always, the masses benefit from the individuals who insist on marching to the beat of their own drummer.
tasks.author: Mike Dooley

tasks.name: When you
tasks.description_short: When you are inspired by some great purpose, some extraordinary project, all your thoughts break their bonds.
tasks.description_html: Your mind transcends limitations, your consciousness expands in every direction, and you find yourself in a new, great, and wonderful world. Dormant forces, faculties and talents become alive, and you discover yourself to be a greater person by far than you ever dreamed yourself to be.
tasks.author: Patanjali

tasks.name: We have
tasks.description_short: We have one precious life: do something extraordinary today, even if it's tiny. A pebble starts the avalanche.
tasks.author: K.A. Laity

tasks.name: It’s never
tasks.description_short: It’s never the lack of opportunities but the lack of preparedness to capitalize on opportunities that are passing by.
tasks.description_html: Read more: http://www.rajeshsetty.com/blog/
tasks.author: Rajesh Setty

tasks.name: When there
tasks.description_short: When there is a great disappointment, we don't know if that's the end of the story. It may be just the beginning of a great adventure.
tasks.description_html: This is a quote from our new iOS app Daily Buddhist Inspirations. Please check it out.
tasks.author: Pema Chödrön

tasks.name: Never stop
tasks.description_short: Never stop dreaming of moonbeams and fairy dust, shiny stars and the wonder of the heavens, a happier life and a better world.
tasks.author: James J. Gormley

tasks.name: There
tasks.description_short: There is no Someday. There is only Today.
tasks.author: Shay Carl

tasks.name: It’s not
tasks.description_short: It’s not what you look at that matters. It’s what you see.
tasks.author: Henri D. Thoreau

tasks.name: It is
tasks.description_short: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
tasks.author: J.K. Rowling

tasks.name: The best
tasks.description_short: The best day of your life is the one on which you decide your life is your own. No apologies or excuses. No one to lean on, rely on, or blame. The gift is yours.
tasks.author: Bob Moawad

tasks.name: Good
tasks.description_short: Good morning, good morning, good morning! Watch, now, how I start the day in happiness, in kindness.
tasks.description_html:
Why I wake early. A poem by Mary Oliver

Hello, sun in my face. Hello, you who made the morning and spread it over the fields and into the faces of the tulips and the nodding morning glories, and into the windows of, even, the miserable and the crotchety – best preacher that ever was, dear star, that just happens to be where you are in the universe to keep us from ever - darkness, to ease us with warm touching, to hold us in the great hands of light – good morning, good morning, good morning. Watch, now, how I start the day in happiness, in kindness.
tasks.author: Mary Oliver

tasks.name: I vow to
tasks.description_short: I vow to let go of all worries and anxiety in order to be light and free.
tasks.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tasks.name: Act as
tasks.description_short: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
tasks.author: William James

tasks.name: I long to
tasks.description_short: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
tasks.author: Helen Keller

tasks.name: There shall
tasks.description_short: There shall be an eternal summer in the grateful heart.
tasks.author: Celia Thaxter

tasks.name: If it's
tasks.description_short: If it's still in your mind, it is worth taking the risk.
tasks.author: Paulo Coelho

tasks.name: Even if
tasks.description_short: Even if we don't have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there.
tasks.author: Stephen Chbosky

tasks.name: Relax
tasks.description_short: Relax. Refresh. Renew. Play. Sing. Laugh. Enjoy. Forgive. Dance. Love. Hug. Share. Kiss. Create. Explore. Hope. Listen. Dare. Trust. Dream. Learn. TODAY!
tasks.author: Steve Maraboli

tasks.name: The meaning
tasks.description_short: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
tasks.author: Pablo Picasso

tasks.name: We cannot
tasks.description_short: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.
tasks.author: Randy Pausch

tasks.name: You have
tasks.description_short: You have within you, right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
tasks.author: Brian Tracy

tasks.name: Learn to enjoy
tasks.description_short: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family.
tasks.description_html: Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
tasks.author: Earl Nightingale

tasks.name: Consult
tasks.description_short: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams.
tasks.description_html:
Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. 

Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
tasks.author: Pope John XXIII

tasks.name: There are
tasks.description_short: There are moments on the brink, when you can set sail for the unknown, or not; walk out onto a stage, or not. Resist then, and there is no returning to the known world. If you turn back, there is only what might have been.
tasks.author: Diane Ackerman

tasks.name: He who
tasks.description_short: He who is contented is rich.
tasks.author: Lao Tzu

tasks.name: You're worthy
tasks.description_short: You're worthy of it all. You just have to believe you are!
tasks.author: Tony A. Gaskins

tasks.name: Whether
tasks.description_short: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't - you're right.
tasks.author: Henry Ford

tasks.name: If you realize
tasks.description_short: If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to. If you are not afraid of dying, there is nothing you cannot achieve.
tasks.description_html: The Pixel Painter from The Pixel Painter on Vimeo.
tasks.author: Lao Tzu

tasks.name: Tell me
tasks.description_short: Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?
tasks.author: Mary Oliver

tasks.name: There is
tasks.description_short: There is no such thing in anyone's life as an unimportant day.
tasks.author: Alexander Woollcott

tasks.name: Do what
tasks.description_short: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
tasks.author: Theodore Roosevelt

tasks.name: God gave you
tasks.description_short: You've been given a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'
tasks.description_html: One day consists of 86,400 seconds. This is one of them.
tasks.author: William Arthur Ward

tasks.name: I can’t
tasks.description_short: I can’t stop pointing to the beauty.
tasks.author: Rumi

tasks.name: Your dream
tasks.description_short: Your dream doesn't have an expiration date. Take a deep breath and try again.
tasks.author: KT Witten

tasks.name: Be kind
tasks.description_short: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
tasks.author: Plato

tasks.name: Breathe. Let go.
tasks.description_short: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
tasks.author: Oprah Winfrey

tasks.name: Don't cry
tasks.description_short: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
tasks.author: Anonymous proverb

tasks.name: It's being
tasks.description_short: It's being here now that's important. All there is ever, is the now.
tasks.description_html: There's no past and there's no future. Time is a very misleading thing. All there is ever, is the now. We can gain experience from the past, but we can't relive it; and we can hope for the future, but we don't know if there is one.
tasks.author: George Harrison

tasks.name: Dwell on
tasks.description_short: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
tasks.author: Marcus Aurelius

tasks.name: When you want
tasks.description_short: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
tasks.author: Paulo Coelho

tasks.name: Just don't
tasks.description_short: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
tasks.author: Ella Fitzgerald

tasks.name: Enjoy
tasks.description_short: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
tasks.author: Robert Brault

tasks.name: I love you
tasks.description_short: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I don't know any other way of loving.
tasks.description_html:
Sonnet XVII: Love

I don't love you as if you were the salt-rose, topaz
or arrow of carnations that propagate fire:
I love you as certain dark things are loved,
secretly, between the shadow and the soul.
I love you as the plant that doesn't bloom and carries
hidden within itself the light of those flowers,
and thanks to your love, darkly in my body
lives the dense fragrance that rises from the earth.

I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where,
I love you simply, without problems or pride:
I love you in this way because I don't know any other way of loving

but this, in which there is no I or you,
so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand,
so intimate that when I fall asleep it is your eyes that close.
tasks.author: Pablo Neruda

tasks.name: You are
tasks.description_short: You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have.
tasks.author: Nicholas Sparks

tasks.name: People
tasks.description_short: People are illogical. Love them anyway. The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
tasks.description_html:
The Paradoxical Commandments

People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered.
Love them anyway.

If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives.
Do good anyway.

If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies.
Succeed anyway.

The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow.
Do good anyway.

Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable.
Be honest and frank anyway.

The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds.
Think big anyway.

People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs.
Fight for a few underdogs anyway.

What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight.
Build anyway.

People really need help but may attack you if you do help them.
Help people anyway.

Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth.
Give the world the best you have anyway.

© Copyright Kent M. Keith 1968, renewed 2001
tasks.author: Kent M. Keith

tasks.name: Be the
tasks.description_short: Be the one who nurtures and builds. Be the one who has an understanding and a forgiving heart, one who looks for the best in people.
tasks.description_html: Leave people better than you found them.
tasks.author: Marvin J. Ashton

tasks.name: Today
tasks.description_short: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You.
tasks.author: Dr. Seuss

tasks.name: Dreams
tasks.description_short: Dreams do come true, if only we wish hard enough. You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
tasks.author: J.M. Barrie

tasks.name: Be the change
tasks.description_short: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
tasks.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tasks.name: Learn
tasks.description_short: Learn to love someone when they least deserve it, because that is when they need your love most.
tasks.author: Rodolfo Costa

tasks.name: The time
tasks.description: The world expects you to produce as well as to consume, to add to and not to subtract from its store of good, to build up and not to tear down, to ennoble and not degrade.
tasks.description_short: The time is short, the opportunity is great; crowd the hours with the best that is in you.
tasks.author: John Hibben

tasks.name: Reminder
tasks.description_short: Reminder: The best opportunities often arrive incognito as endings.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Instant PepTalk - Happiness, made in collaboration with Karen Salmansohn.
tasks.author: Karen Salmansohn

tasks.name: I believe in you.
tasks.description_short: I believe in you. You can do this. It's inside you. I've seen it in flashes. You can bring it out all the time if you work hard and have fun with it. And I will help you.
tasks.author: Steve Horan

tasks.name: If you have
tasks.description_short: If you have your health, if you have people in your life to love, you are blessed. Slow down and enjoy the simple things in life.
tasks.author: Joel Osteen

tasks.name: Just be
tasks.description_short: Just be yourself. Let people see the real, imperfect, flawed, quirky, weird, beautiful, magical person that you are.
tasks.description_html: Check out: thesinglewoman.net
tasks.author: Mandy Hale

tasks.name: Disappointment
tasks.description_short: Disappointment should always be taken as a stimulant and never viewed as a discouragement.
tasks.author: C.B.Newcomb

tasks.name: It is
tasks.description_short: It is neither wealth nor splendor, but tranquility and occupation which give happiness.
tasks.author: Thomas Jefferson

tasks.name: Your time
tasks.description_short: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t let the noise of other’s opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
tasks.author: Steve Jobs

tasks.name: Accept
tasks.description_short: Accept what is, let go of what was and have faith in what will be.
tasks.author: Sonia Ricotti

tasks.name: You are worthy
tasks.description_short: You are worthy of love and respect. You are beautiful, gifted, and intelligent. Don’t let the storm make you forget it.
tasks.author: Thema Davis

tasks.name: Never settle.
tasks.description_short: Never settle. Fight for the life, the career, the dreams, the love that you deserve.
tasks.author: Mandy Hale

tasks.name: To be
tasks.description_short: To be given life would have been sufficient. But not only that, to have a healthy body, a kind heart, a good mind... thank you, Life.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Awakening Joy - 10 Steps to Happiness, made in collaboration with James Baraz.
tasks.author: James Baraz

tasks.name: I'm gonna
tasks.description_short: I'm gonna make the rest of my life, the best of my life!

tasks.name: Your life
tasks.description_short: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
tasks.author: Jim Rohn

tasks.name: Yesterday
tasks.description_short: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
tasks.author: Mother Teresa

tasks.name: Someone
tasks.description_short: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.
tasks.author: Mary Oliver

tasks.name: Twenty
tasks.description_short: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
tasks.author: H. Jackson Brown

tasks.name: It is
tasks.description_short: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
tasks.author: John Steinbeck

tasks.name: Your destiny
tasks.description_short: Your destiny is too great, your assignment too important, your time too valuable. Don’t let fear intimidate you.
tasks.author: Joel Osteen

tasks.name: I expect
tasks.description_short: I expect to pass through this world but once. Any good therefore that I can do, or any kindness or abilities that I can show to any fellow creature, let me do it now. Let me not defer it or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again.
tasks.author: William Penn

tasks.name: It's amazing
tasks.description_short: It's amazing what you can accomplish if you simply refuse to quit.
tasks.author: Porter Stansberry

tasks.name: Traffic jams
tasks.description_short: Traffic jams and crowded aisles and long checkout lines give us time to think - cherish these moments.
tasks.description_html: The really important kind of freedom involves attention, and awareness, and discipline, and effort, and being able truly to care about other people and to sacrifice for them, over and over...
tasks.author: David Foster Wallace

tasks.name: With the new
tasks.description_short: With the new day, comes new strength and new thoughts.
tasks.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

tasks.name: Deep peace
tasks.description_short: Deep peace of the running wave to you. Deep peace of the flowing air to you. Deep peace of the quiet earth to you. Deep peace, pure blue of the sky to you.
tasks.author: Fiona MacLeod

tasks.name: I have learned
tasks.description_short: I have learned over the years that when one’s mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
tasks.author: Rosa Parks

tasks.name: Whatever
tasks.description_short: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
tasks.description_html: Quote and narration from Steve Jobs. Created by Co.MISSION Content Group.
tasks.author: Goethe

tasks.name: May the
tasks.description_short: May the sun bring you new energy by day, may the moon softly restore you by night. May the rain wash away your worries and the breeze blow new strength into your being, and all of the days of your life may you walk gently through the world and know its beauty.
tasks.author: Quote author: Apache Blessing

tasks.name: Change
tasks.description_short: Change can be scary, but you know what’s scarier? Allowing fear to stop you from growing, evolving, and progressing.
tasks.description_html: Check out: thesinglewoman.net
tasks.author: Mandy Hale

tasks.name: In the
tasks.description_short: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
tasks.author: Albert Einstein

tasks.name: To Everyone,
tasks.description_short: To Everyone, my humble thanks.
tasks.description_html: Think of something for which you are grateful today. Say thanks.

tasks.name: Don't walk
tasks.description_short: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Friend Posters.
tasks.author: Albert Camus

tasks.name: From every
tasks.description_short: From every wound there is a scar, and every scar tells a story. A story that says, “I survived.”
tasks.author: Craig Scott

tasks.name: I'll
tasks.description_short: I'll carry my sunshine with me wherever I go!
tasks.author: Miss Jean Gall

tasks.name: You can
tasks.description_short: You can come to understand your purpose in life by slowing down and feeling your heart's desires.
tasks.author: Marcia Wieder

tasks.name: When you
tasks.description_short: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
tasks.author: W. Clement Stone

tasks.name: One of
tasks.description_short: One of the most wonderful things about life is that there's always so much more to know, so much more to discover.
tasks.author: Joni E. Tada

tasks.name: “What day is it?”
tasks.description_short: “What day is it?” asked Pooh. “It’s today,” squeaked Piglet. “My favorite day,” said Pooh.
tasks.author: A.A. Milne

tasks.name: The greatest
tasks.description_short: The greatest use of life is to spend it for something that outlasts it.
tasks.author: William James

tasks.name: To those who
tasks.description_short: To those who see with loving eyes, life is beautiful. To those who speak with tender voices, life is peaceful. To those who help with gentle hands, life is full. And to those who care with compassionate hearts, life is good beyond all measure.
tasks.author: Gilles Lamarche

tasks.name: How far you
tasks.description_short: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in life you will have been all of these.
tasks.author: George Washington Carver

tasks.name: Every day
tasks.description_short: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
tasks.author: Doug Firebaugh

tasks.name: Love your life.
tasks.description_short: Love your life. Believe in your own power, your own potential, and your own innate goodness.
tasks.author: Vickie M. Worsham

tasks.name: Reach
tasks.description_short: Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug.
tasks.description_html:
Realize that true happiness lies within you. Waste no time and effort searching for peace and contentment and joy in the world outside. 

Remember that there is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving. Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug.

Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
tasks.author: Og Mandino

tasks.name: You can't
tasks.description_short: You can't have a better tomorrow if you're thinking about yesterday.
tasks.author: Charles Kettering

tasks.name: Never
tasks.description_short: Never give up on something that you can’t go a day without thinking about.
tasks.author: Winston Churchill

tasks.name: We cannot
tasks.description_short: We cannot predict the future, but we can invent it.
tasks.author: Dennis Gabor

tasks.name: Don’t keep
tasks.description_short: Don’t keep forever on the public road, going only where others have gone and following one after the other like a flock of sheep. Leave the beaten track occasionally and dive into the woods.
tasks.author: Alexander Graham Bell

tasks.name: He has
tasks.description_short: He has achieved success who has lived well, laughed often and loved much; Who has always looked for the best in others and given the best he had.
tasks.description_html:
Who has gained the respect of intelligent men and the love of little children;

Who has filled his niche and accomplished his task; 

Who has left the world better than he found it, whether by an improved poppy, a perfect poem, or a rescued soul; 

Who has never lacked appreciation of earth’s beauty or failed to express it; 

Whose life was an inspiration; whose memory a benediction.
tasks.author: Bessie A. Stanley

tasks.name: Some
tasks.description_short: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
tasks.author: Roger Miller

tasks.name: Watch
tasks.description_short: Watch your thoughts, they become words; watch your words, they become actions; watch your actions, they become habits; watch your habits, they become character; watch your character, for it becomes your destiny.
tasks.author: Frank Outlaw

tasks.name: Life
tasks.description_short: Life is a cycle, always in motion, if good times have moved on so will times of trouble.
tasks.author: Ritu Ghatourey

tasks.name: The universe
tasks.description_short: The universe is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
tasks.author: Eden Phillpotts

tasks.name: Experience
tasks.description_short: Experience is not what happens to a man; it is what a man does with what happens to him.
tasks.author: Aldous Huxley

tasks.name: Try to
tasks.description_short: Try to make at least one person happy every day. If you cannot do a kind deed, speak a kind word. If you cannot speak a kind word, think a kind thought.
tasks.description_html: Count up, if you can, the treasure of happiness that you would dispense in a week, in a year, in a lifetime!
tasks.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

tasks.name: It is only
tasks.description_short: It is only when the mind is free from the old that it meets everything anew, and in that there is joy.
tasks.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

tasks.name: Your success
tasks.description_short: Your success is not final — nor is your failure. You may always begin again.
tasks.description_html:
Birth is simply a designation, as is death. Both are relatives, and both are important as in turn they rise a little to mark off their space in the one great endless expression which we call Time.

So that if you are wise, you will not worry. Your success is not final—nor is your failure. You may always begin again. There is no finality!

Even decay is but an expression of life. The fallen flower, wilted and forgotten, excepting for the perfume which it sent to the four winds of the world, soon is known to mingle its ashes in the warmth of the earth — to rise again in new forms and new beauties.
tasks.author: George Matthew Adams

tasks.name: I have
tasks.description_short: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
tasks.author: Harry S. Truman

tasks.name: Cherish
tasks.description_short: Cherish your visions; cherish your ideals; cherish the music that stirs in your heart, the beauty that forms in your mind, the loveliness that drapes your purest thoughts, for out of them will grow all delightful conditions, all, heavenly environment; of these, if you but remain true to them, your world will at last be built.
tasks.author: James Allen

tasks.name: Keep
tasks.description_short: Keep some room in your heart for the unimaginable.
tasks.author: Mary Oliver

tasks.name: Let noble
tasks.description_short: Let noble thoughts come to us from every side.
tasks.author: Rigveda

tasks.name: We awaken
tasks.description_short: We awaken in others the same attitude of mind we hold toward them.
tasks.author: Elbert Hubbard

tasks.name: Children
tasks.description_short: Children see magic because they look for it.
tasks.author: Christopher Moore

tasks.name: Even
tasks.description_short: Even if some people are insensitive or unkind, you're not going to mind because the blessings you received are far greater than the burdens you experience.
tasks.description_html: You deserve a day where worries don't get in the way of anything. Remember, stay positive.
tasks.author: Ritu Ghatourey

tasks.name: You can
tasks.description_short: You can have it all. Just not all at once.
tasks.author: Oprah Winfrey

tasks.name: Being content
tasks.description_short: Being content and having a meaningful life comes from being honest, humble and real. It comes from sharing our lives by loving and serving and touching the lives of others.
tasks.author: Doug Gonser

tasks.name: Love is
tasks.description_short: Today my heart opens a little bit more as I go about creating the world I want to live in.
tasks.author: Louise L. Hay

tasks.name: Ask yourself
tasks.description_short: Ask yourself what kind of person you want to be in the life that you will live today. Throughout the day, remind yourself that your life is happening right now.
tasks.description_html:
This is a quote from our new iOS app Daily Buddhist Inspirations. Please check it out.

"We sometimes wake up fresh in the morning yet still go through the day half asleep. Our busy 21st century lives overwhelm us with a relentless stream of immediate tasks. We lose sight of how precious it is just to have a human life.

This is an awareness that we need to feel in our hearts. I would like to share with you a practice that I call 'living your whole life in a single day.' You can do this by starting with this thought in the morning: 'I am starting a whole new life. It begins right now'. Initially, leave yourself a note at your bedside to remind you, and then slowly cultivate the habit of waking up with this thought.

Your body is fresh from the night's rest; when you wake up with this awareness, so does your mind. Ask yourself what kind of person you want to be in the life that you will live today. Throughout the day, remind yourself that your life is happening right now. In the afternoon, check to see how your life is going and readjust as needed. A whole lifetime of possibilities stretches out before you every moment.

This is the basic truth of interdependence. Conditions are constantly shifting, and what seemed impossible earlier can suddenly become possible. Every moment counts. Every action counts. A single kind act can have a positive impact on the future of many others you share the earth with. You can change the course of the future in any moment. Do so consciously, and the whole world will benefit." Source: The Times of India
tasks.author: H.H. the Karmapa

tasks.name: Create
tasks.description_short: Create a sacred space for that which matters most.
tasks.description_html:
Listen:

This is a quote from our new iOS app Zen Habits. Please check it out.
tasks.author: Leo Babauta

tasks.name: People are attracted
tasks.description_short: People are attracted to you by what they see in you; they remain attracted to you by what you see in yourself.
tasks.author: Mark Amend

tasks.name: Decide in
tasks.description_short: Decide in your heart of hearts what really excites and challenges you, and start moving your life in that direction. Every decision you make, from what you eat to what you do with your time tonight, turns you into who you are tomorrow, and the day after that.
tasks.description_html:
Look at who you want to be, and start sculpting yourself into that person. You may not get exactly where you thought you’d be, but you will be doing things that suit you in a profession you believe in.

Don’t let life randomly kick you into the adult you don’t want to become.
tasks.author: Chris Hadfield

tasks.name: Take care
tasks.description_short: Take care of someone else. Be there for someone else. Bless someone else. A happy life is about giving more than you take.
tasks.author: Mandy Hale

tasks.name: What you
tasks.description_short: What you make of your life is up to you. You have all the tools and resources you need. What you do with them is up to you. The choice is yours.
tasks.description_html:
Rules For Being Human by Cherie Carter-Scott

You will receive a body.
You may like it or hate it,
but it's yours to keep
for the entire period.

You will learn lessons.
You are enrolled in a full-time,
informal school called life.

There are no mistakes, only lessons.
Growth is a process of trial, error
and experimentation.

The "failed" experiments are as much
a part of the process as the experiments
that ultimately "work".

Lessons are repeated until they are learned.
A lesson will be presented to you in various forms
until you have learned it.
When you have learned it,
you can go on to the next lesson.

Learning lessons does not end.
There is no part of life that doesn't
contain it's lessons.
If you're alive,
there are still lessons to be learned.

"There" is no better than "here".
When your "there" has become "here",
you will simply obtain another "there"
that will again look better than "here".

Other people are merely mirrors of you.
You cannot love or hate something
about another person unless it reflects to you
something you love or hate about yourself.

What you make of your life is up to you.
You have all the tools and resources you need.
What you do with them is up to you.

The choice is yours.
tasks.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

tasks.name: Everything is either
tasks.description_short: Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose.
tasks.author: Wayne Dyer

tasks.name: If you break your neck
tasks.description_short: If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you've got a problem. Everything else is an inconvenience.
tasks.description_html:
One of life's best coping mechanisms is to know the difference between an inconvenience and a problem. If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you've got a problem. Everything else is an inconvenience.

Life is inconvenient. Life is lumpy. A lump in the oatmeal, a lump in the throat and a lump in the breast are not the same kind of lump. One needs to learn the difference.
tasks.author: Robert Fulghum

tasks.name: Nothing binds you
tasks.description_short: Nothing binds you except your thoughts; nothing limits you except your fear; and nothing controls you except your beliefs.
tasks.author: Marianne Williamson

tasks.name: I seek to
tasks.description_short: I seek to learn about the world around me. I seek to learn how to be a proper human being. Clouds show me the nature of my world. Rivers show me the nature of myself.
tasks.description_html:
"I am a Student" by Ringu Tulku Rinpoche

It is a pleasure to learn that I don’t know.
It is a pleasure to learn that I already know.
It is a pleasure to learn that I was mistaken.

It is a joy to learn by sharing what I learned.
It is a joy to learn how to be what I am.

I seek to learn about the world around me.
I seek to learn about what I actually am.
I seek to learn how to be a proper human being.

Clouds show me the nature of my world.
Rivers show me the nature of myself.

--

For more quotes like this get our new app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: Ringu Tulku Rinpoche

tasks.name: Not every person
tasks.description_short: Not every person is going to understand you and that’s okay. They have a right to their opinion and you have every right to ignore it.
tasks.author: Joel Osteen

tasks.name: A hundred
tasks.description_short: A hundred times every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life depend on the labours of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the same measure as I have received and am still receiving.
tasks.description_html:
The World as I See It by Albert Einstein

"What an extraordinary situation is that of us mortals! Each of us is here for a brief sojourn; for what purpose he knows not, though he sometimes thinks he feels it.

But from the point of view of daily life, without going deeper, we exist for our fellow-men--in the first place for those on whose smiles and welfare all our happiness depends, and next for all those unknown to us personally with whose destinies we are bound up by the tie of sympathy.

A hundred times every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life depend on the labours of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the same measure as I have received and am still receiving.

I am strongly drawn to the simple life and am often oppressed by the feeling that I am engrossing an unnecessary amount of the labour of my fellow-men.

I regard class differences as contrary to justice and, in the last resort, based on force. I also consider that plain living is good for everybody, physically and mentally.

I have never looked upon ease and happiness as ends in themselves - such an ethical basis I call more proper for a herd of swine.

The ideals which have lighted me on my way and time after time given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been Truth, Goodness, and Beauty."
tasks.author: Albert Einstein

tasks.name: The future
tasks.description: The future is not a result of choices among alternative paths offered by the present, but a place that is created – created first in the mind and will, created next in activity.
tasks.description_short: The future is not some place we are going to, but one we are creating. The paths are not to be found, but made, and the activity of making them, changes both the maker and the destination.
tasks.author: Deborah James

tasks.name: Believing
tasks.description_short: Believing in your implicit worth liberates you to create more value for the world you serve.
tasks.author: Danielle LaPorte

tasks.name: Love is patient
tasks.description_short: Love is patient and is kind; love doesn’t envy. Love doesn’t brag, is not proud, doesn’t behave itself inappropriately, doesn’t seek its own way, is not provoked, takes no account of evil; doesn’t rejoice in unrighteousness, but rejoices with the truth.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Bible Surprise
tasks.author: 1 Corinthians 13:4

tasks.name: One doesn't
tasks.description_short: One doesn't discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore.
tasks.author: André Gide

tasks.name: How do we
tasks.description_short: How do we keep our inner fire alive? Two things, at minimum, are needed: an ability to appreciate the positives in our life – and a commitment to action.
tasks.description_html: Every day, it's important to ask and answer these questions: ‘What's good in my life?’ and ‘What needs to be done?
tasks.author: Nathaniel Branden

tasks.name: The worst thing
tasks.description_short: The worst thing one can do is not to try, to be aware of what one wants and not give in to it, to spend years in silent hurt wondering if something could have materialized - and never knowing.
tasks.author: David Viscott

tasks.name: We are visitors on this planet.
tasks.description_short: We are visitors on this planet. We are here for ninety or one hundred years at the very most. During that period, we must try to do something good, something useful, with our lives. If you contribute to other people's happiness, you will find the true goal, the true meaning of life.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our new app Dalai Lama Surprise
tasks.author: Dalai Lama

tasks.name: Follow your bliss and don't be afraid
tasks.description_short: Follow your bliss and don't be afraid, and doors will open where you didn't know they were going to be.
tasks.description_html:
Follow your bliss... If you do follow your bliss, you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living.

When you can see that, you begin to meet people who are in your field of bliss, and they open doors to you.
tasks.author: Joseph Campbell

tasks.name: You might have
tasks.description_short: You might have problems in your life. Everybody does. But you are more fortunate than you think.
tasks.description_html: In order for you to be healthy, so many things in your body have to work right. If even just one thing goes wrong, you could lose your health. Being healthy is miraculous, but often we don’t appreciate it enough.
tasks.author: Donald Latumahina

tasks.name: Happiness
tasks.description_short: Happiness is love. Full stop.
tasks.author: George Vaillant

tasks.name: If you limit
tasks.description_short: If you limit your choices only to what seems possible or reasonable, you disconnect yourself from what you truly want, and all that is left is a compromise.
tasks.author: Robert Fritz

tasks.name: Become the observer.
tasks.description_short: Become the observer. When you do that, you put some space between yourself and your angry impulses, and in that little space, you have room to decide. How will you respond?
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Zen Habits
tasks.author: Leo Babauta

tasks.name: You won’t be
tasks.description_short: You won’t be happy with more until you’re happy with what you’ve got.
tasks.author: Viki King

tasks.name: Be bold in what
tasks.description_short: Be bold in what you stand for and careful what you fall for.
tasks.author: Ruth Boorstin

tasks.name: Attitude
tasks.description_short: Attitude is the “little” thing that makes the big difference.
tasks.description_html: The story of life proves that it is often the minute things that spell the differences between triumph and tragedy, success and failure, victory or defeat.
tasks.author: Zig Ziglar

tasks.name: Our goal should
tasks.description_short: Our goal should be to live life in radical amazement... get up in the morning and look at the world in a way that takes nothing for granted. Everything is phenomenal; everything is incredible; never treat life casually. To be spiritual is to be amazed.
tasks.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

tasks.name: Seek the wisdom
tasks.description_short: Seek the wisdom of the ages, but look at the world through the eyes of a child.
tasks.author: Ron Wild

tasks.name: The brick
tasks.description_short: The brick walls are not there to keep us out; the brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
tasks.author: Randy Pausch

tasks.name: The fact that
tasks.description_short: The fact that you are even here, alive, on this planet is a mathematical miracle, and you should not spend the time that you have being busy being miserable.
tasks.author: Philip DeFranco

tasks.name: When you are
tasks.description_short: When you are dreaming of what is possible for your life, you should know that anything is possible. You may not always feel it or see it, but you never for a single moment lack the capacity to change course. Your life is subject to infinite revision.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: H.H. the Karmapa

tasks.name: May I choose wisely
tasks.description_short: May I choose wisely and well from waking to day's end and be a blessing to all I meet.
tasks.description_html:
The Day is Done Prayer by Abby Willowroot

The day is done
it cannot be changed
my actions and my thoughts
reflected my own spirit on this day
of some, I am proud, of some, I am not.

When I wake... there will be new chances
to think and act with wisdom and compassion
there will be new temptations to be petty, small or selfish.
tasks.author: Abby Willowroot

tasks.name: Amor Vincit Omnia
tasks.description_short: Amor Vincit Omnia - Love Conquers All

tasks.name: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
tasks.description_short: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
tasks.description_html: Almost everything - all external expectations, all pride, all fear of embarrassment or failure - these things just fall away in the face of death, leaving only what is truly important. Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
tasks.author: Steve Jobs

tasks.name: Remembering - NEKAJ JE NAROBE
tasks.description_short: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
tasks.description_html: Almost everything - all external expectations, all pride, all fear of embarrassment or failure - these things just fall away in the face of death, leaving only what is truly important. Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
tasks.author: Steve Jobs

tasks.name: Often it is better simply - NAPAKA!
tasks.description_short: Often it is better simply to slow down, to put aside our eagerness in order to see and listen to others, to stop rushing from one thing to another and to remain with someone who has faltered along the way.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our new app Pope Francis
tasks.author: Pope Francis

tasks.name: Being Present
tasks.description_short: Being present is practicing the presence of the divine in all moments - no matter how simple and trivial they may appear.
tasks.author: Carla Goddard

tasks.name: The journey is much easier
tasks.description_short: The journey is much easier when you are not carrying your past.
tasks.author: Sheila Burke

tasks.name: Humility
tasks.description_short: Humility leads to strength and not to weakness. It is the highest form of self-respect to admit mistakes and to make amends for them.
tasks.author: John J. McCloy

tasks.name: A whole lifetime
tasks.description_short: A whole lifetime of possibilities stretches out before you every moment.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our new app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: H.H. the Karmapa

tasks.name: You can’t calm
tasks.description_short: You can’t calm the storm... so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
tasks.author: Timber Hawkeye

tasks.name: Don’t block the exit
tasks.description_short: Don’t block the exit. If someone wants to leave, release them and hold on to your peace.
tasks.author: Thema Davis

tasks.name: I like living.
tasks.description_short: I like living. I have sometimes been wildly, despairingly, acutely miserable, racked with sorrow, but through it all I still know quite certainly that just to be alive is a grand thing.
tasks.author: Agatha Christie

tasks.name: See what is beautiful
tasks.description_short: See what is beautiful in every person’s path, in every religion, and in every belief system. Honor other people’s paths even if they are different from yours.
tasks.description_html:
There is no one “right” way to grow... see what is beautiful in every person’s path, in every religion, and in every belief system. Honor other people’s paths even if they are different from yours.

Be inclusive and loving, and look beyond the form of people’s beliefs to their essence.

There is no right way; there is only the way that is right for you.
tasks.author: Sanaya Roman

tasks.name: One day you will wake up
tasks.description_short: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
tasks.author: Paulo Coelho

tasks.name: Am I doing
tasks.description_short: Am I doing something right now that’s based on one of my values or principles?
tasks.description_html: - For more quotes like this get our app Zen Habits
tasks.author: Leo Babauta

tasks.name: May the nourishment
tasks.description_short: May the nourishment of the earth be yours. May the clarity of light be yours. May the fluency of the ocean be yours.
tasks.description_html:
A Blessing — by John O’Donohue

And may the protection of the ancestors be yours.

And so may a slow
Wind work these words
Of love around you,
An invisible cloak
To mind your life.
tasks.author: John O’Donohue

tasks.name: Small changes can
tasks.description_short: Small changes can eventually add up to huge results.
tasks.author: Optimus Prime

tasks.name: Being true to ourselves
tasks.description_short: Being true to ourselves gives us the insight and compassion to see others for who they are, not who we expect them to be. It frees us up from the judgment of ourselves and others and it gives others the freedom to be themselves as well.
tasks.author: Victoria J. Reynolds

tasks.name: The mind of compassion
tasks.description_short: The mind of compassion knows no bitterness nor judgment. No good nor bad, no right nor wrong, no true nor false. Only the wish for all beings to be happy.
tasks.author: Kuan Yin

tasks.name: Waking up this morning
tasks.description_short: Waking up this morning, I smile. Twenty-four brand new hours are before me. I vow to live fully in each moment and to look at all beings with eyes of compassion.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tasks.name: Four Very Powerful
tasks.description_short: Four very powerful words to say to your child: I BELIEVE IN YOU.
tasks.author: Kevin Heath

tasks.name: First say to yourself
tasks.description_short: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
tasks.author: Epictetus

tasks.name: Every failure is a stepping stone to success.
tasks.description_short: Every failure is a stepping stone to success. Every difficulty or disappointment is a trial of your faith. Every unpleasant incident or temptation is a test of your inner strength.
tasks.description_html:
This world is your best teacher. There is a lesson in everything. There is a lesson in each experience. Learn it and become wise.

Every failure is a stepping stone to success. Every difficulty or disappointment is a trial of your faith. Every unpleasant incident or temptation is a test of your inner strength.

Therefore nil desperandum. March forward hero!
tasks.author: Swami Sivananda

tasks.name: There is only one journey.
tasks.description_short: There is only one journey. Going inside yourself.
tasks.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

tasks.name: Blessed
tasks.description_short: Blessed are your eyes, for they see; and your ears, for they hear.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Bible Surprise
tasks.author: Bible, Matthew 13:16

tasks.name: False. When things change,
tasks.description_short: False. When things change, I will be happy. True. When I am happy, things will change.
tasks.author: Kyle Cease

tasks.name: Quiet the mind
tasks.description_short: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
tasks.author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

tasks.name: Live simply.
tasks.description_short: Live simply. Deepest joy is like a flower... beautiful in essence.
tasks.author: Tony Samara

tasks.name: Love is spelled T.I.M.E
tasks.description_short: Love is spelled T.I.M.E

tasks.name: If you have time to chatter,
tasks.description_short: If you have time to chatter, read books. If you have time to read, walk into mountain, desert and ocean. If you have time to walk, sing songs and dance.
tasks.author: Nanao Sakaki

tasks.name: I slept and dreamt that life was joy.
tasks.description_short: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
tasks.author: Rabindranath Tagore

tasks.name: Happiness
tasks.description_short: Happiness wants you. Let it in.
tasks.description_html: Please check out our app Instant PepTalk - Happiness, made in collaboration with Karen Salmansohn.
tasks.author: Karen Salmasohn

tasks.name: The things that
tasks.description_short: The things that we love tell us what we are.
tasks.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

tasks.name: We come to love
tasks.description_short: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
tasks.author: Sam Keen

tasks.name: If you want to lift
tasks.description_short: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
tasks.author: Booker T. Washington

tasks.name: It is never too
tasks.description_short: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
tasks.author: George Eliot

tasks.name: If not us
tasks.description_short: If not us, who? If not now, when?
tasks.author: Hillel the Elder

tasks.name: Do not anticipate
tasks.description_short: Do not anticipate trouble, or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
tasks.author: Benjamin Franklin

tasks.name: I urge you to
tasks.description_short: I urge you to please notice when you are happy, and exclaim or murmur or think at some point, “If this isn’t nice, I don’t know what is."
tasks.author: Kurt Vonnegut

tasks.name: Every moment
tasks.description_short: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
tasks.author: T. S. Eliot

tasks.name: If we look at ourselves directly
tasks.description_short: If we look at ourselves directly, without hesitation or embarrassment, we find that we have a lot of strength and a lot of resources available constantly.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.
tasks.author: Chogyam Trungpa

tasks.name: How wonderful
tasks.description_short: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before beginning to improve the world.
tasks.author: Anne Frank

tasks.name: The longer I live
tasks.description_short: The longer I live the more beautiful life becomes.
tasks.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

tasks.name: When you plant
tasks.description_short: When you plant a seed of love, it is you that blossoms.
tasks.author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

tasks.name: Let all that you
tasks.description_short: Let all that you do be done in love.
tasks.description_html: For more quotes like this get our app Bible Surprise
tasks.author: Bible, 1 Corinthians 16:14

tasks.name: May you receive the wisdom
tasks.description_short: May you receive the wisdom, strength, and courage to overcome the barriers blocking your divine purpose.
tasks.author: Thema Davis

tasks.name: If you can solve your problem,
tasks.description_short: If you can solve your problem, then what is the need of worrying? If you cannot solve it, then what is the use of worrying?
tasks.author: Shantideva

tasks.name: Don't overlook life's
tasks.description_short: Don't overlook life's small joys while searching for the big ones.
tasks.author: H. Jackson Brown

tasks.name: Whatever we have, wherever we are
tasks.description_short: We can start from nothing. Whatever we have, wherever we are — that is the place we can start from. Any point is the right starting point.
tasks.description_html:
For more quotes like this get our app Daily Buddhist Inspirations.

"Many people have the idea that they lack what they need in order to start working toward their dreams. They feel they do not have enough power, or they do not have enough money. But they should know that any point is the right starting point.

This is the perspective that emptiness opens up. We can start from zero."

Source: shambhalasun.com
tasks.author: H.H. the Karmapa

tasks.name: When it happens that you are broken,
tasks.description_short: When it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.
tasks.description_html:
Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won’t either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up.

And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.
tasks.author: Louise Erdrich

tasks.name: One of the most important of life´s lessons
tasks.description_short: One of the most important of life's lessons is to learn independence, to understand freedom. This means independence from attachments, from results, from opinions, and from expectations.
tasks.description_html: Breaking attachments leads to freedom, but breaking attachments does not mean abandoning a loving and meaningful relationship, a relationship that nourishes your soul. It means ending dependency on any person or thing. Love is never a dependency.
tasks.author: Brian L. Weiss

tasks.name: Your journey has molded you
tasks.description_short: Your journey has molded you for the greater good, and it was exactly what it needed to be. Don't think that you've lost time. It took each and every situation you have encountered to bring you to the now. And now is right on time.
tasks.author: Asha Tyson

tasks.name: May you always be blessed with walls for the wind.
tasks.description_short: May you always be blessed with walls for the wind. A roof for the rain. A warm cup of tea by the fire. Laughter to cheer you. Those you love near you. And all that your heart might desire.
tasks.author: Irish Proverb

tasks.name: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
tasks.description_short: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
tasks.author: C.S. Lewis

tasks.name: Don't be pushed by your problems,
tasks.description_short: Don't be pushed by your problems, be led by your dreams.
tasks.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tasks.name: Life is 10% what happens
tasks.description_short: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it. We are in charge of our attitudes.
tasks.description_html:
The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life. Attitude to me is more important than facts. It is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than failures, than successes, than what other people think or say or do. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill. It will make or break a company… a church… a home.

The remarkable thing is, we have a choice every day regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day. We cannot change our past… We cannot change the fact that people will act a certain way. We cannot change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is plan on the one thing we have, and that is our attitude…

I am convinced that life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it. And so it is with you… We are in charge of our attitudes.
tasks.author: Charles R. Swindoll

tasks.name: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them
